treatment

Class Medication

  • java.lang.Object
    • treatment.Treatment
      • treatment.Medication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MedicationIN, TreatmentIN, Expirable, StockItem
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActivatedCarbon, Aspirin, Misc, SleepingTablets, Vitamins

    public abstract class Medication
extends Treatment
implements Expirable, MedicationIN, StockItem
    This class represent treatment by medication.
